    About Me

    Hi! I am currently working in Embedded Real-Time Systems Lab, CSE Department at IIT Bombay. I have over 2 years of experience in firmware development. My current area of interest is in implementing Machine Learning on Resource Constrained Devices.

    How to pronounce my name?
